name: Bala Krishnan
summary: I am a passionate and results-driven React Native Developer with a strong foundation in JavaScript, React.js, and TypeScript. As the co-founder of StuPro, I specialize in designing and developing high-performing, user-friendly mobile applications. With a keen interest in Data Science and AI, I constantly explore ways to integrate analytics into app development to enhance user experiences. My UI/UX expertise in Figma allows me to create intuitive, visually appealing applications that prioritize user engagement. Beyond development, I excel in problem-solving, critical thinking, and collaboration, ensuring efficient teamwork in agile environments.

experience.summary: Break Time Tv - Live TV Streaming App is a feature-rich React Native application designed to provide a seamless streaming experience. The app allows users to browse and watch world free live TV channels, switch between different languages, and access high-quality video content.

mentorBridgeExp.summary: I gained extensive hands-on experience in JavaScript, React.js, and React Native, contributing significantly to the development of a TypeScript-based React Native application named Stupro. I was responsible for creating multiple pages and modules, including onboarding, Daily Challenges, Profile, and Leaderboard pages, while implementing key features such as carousels, async storage, animations, and navigation. For the onboarding page, I utilized FlatList with default animations and pagination to enhance user experience. On the Daily Challenges page, I mapped tasks dynamically to create an engaging interface. The Profile page was designed with a card-style layout to display user information, streak details, and access to change password and preferences pages. The Leaderboard page showcased a list of top performers based on points earned through daily challenges. I leveraged the react-native-reanimated-carousel package to implement a carousel on the home page and used Async Storage for offline storage of profile details and user credentials. Navigation across the application was seamlessly handled using React Native Navigation, while animations were enhanced with the React Native Reanimated package to improve user experience. Additionally, I collaborated closely with the team to develop and refine application features, actively participating in team discussions, problem-solving sessions, and code reviews in an agile environment. My role also involved using Figma to design sitemaps and structure multiple pages, ensuring a seamless and intuitive user experience. This experience allowed me to grow as a developer, fostering collaboration, continuous learning, and a strong focus on delivering high-quality solutions.

summary: My role involves strategic planning, product development, and team coordination to ensure the platform meets industry standards and user expectations. This project not only showcased my technical skills but also highlighted my commitment to creating inclusive technology that bridges communication gaps.
